name: Virtual Indonesian
description:
Learning Indonesian? Virtual Indonesian is a program you might want to check out. Meant as an addition to those using Duolingo, Virtual Bahasa Indonesia allows you to explore a house, visit a park, learn new words, and refresh your memory on previously learned words!

The program is free for those on Itch.io with an option to donate to the development of the software. An additional paid version will be found on the Microsoft Store for those wanting the ease of updates along with additional updates and features.
